text: anyone else getting long delays in seeing template changes after publishing?
Is the cache never getting purged, or is it just slow?
Are you just experiencing this on template previews?

template previews are refreshing just fine, but after publishing, the changes don't show up for 10+mins, if at all (and this is after clearing browser caches, checking in multiple browsers, trying incognito/private windows)
Could you DM me an example <@U9KA594Q3>
Are you still experiencing the cacheing issue?
haven't checked again yet, had moved onto a different project
looks like the changes i made have finally populated at least
It should take at most a few seconds to update (invalidate the cache). If it is taking longer that that, let me know. Thanks.
Reposting from <#CCQ7H31D5|developer-tools> because this is super rad and I want to make sure you all see - <https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CCQ7H31D5/p1539103069000100>

Not sure why but for some reason the old advanced menus url doesn’t redirect to the new navigation screen.

Related - has the new navigation management been fully rolled out to everyone?
Anyone know if there is a translation integration/tool in the works for multilingual and international sites?
I’m not sure if it’s what you want but there is a functionality already built in to be able to build multi-language sites

I think it requires a higher HS plan. The feature doesn’t auto translate your pages though, you still have to get that done elsewhere. There are also some services you can use that can use javascript or some DNS wizardry to provide translations

thanks for the response, jon. i do know about the built in translation tool, but i’m looking for a way to translate all of the page content. i actually reached out to one of my HubSpot contacts and they sent over a link to the integrations for Smartling and <http://Translate.com|Translate.com>.
<https://www.HubSpot.com/integrations/smartling>
<https://www.HubSpot.com/integrations/translate>
